thread.title: Miami fires Al Golden after worst loss in program history
thread.title_full: Miami fires Al Golden after worst loss in program history

title: Miami fires Al Golden after worst loss in program history
text:
> Florida Miami fires Al Golden after worst loss in program history FILE - In this Feb. 1, 2012, file photo, Miami head football coach Al Golden gestures as he speaks during a news conference in Coral Gables, Fla. Miami has fired Golden, midway through his fifth season and one day after the Hurricanes endured the worst loss in the program's 90-year history. (AP Photo/Wilfredo Lee, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
